content.rendered:
A Binocular Stereomicroscope to Detect Small Scratches and Stains through Stereopsis

  • Easily detects scratches and stains on the entire contact lens by switching between epi-illumination and transmitted illumination
  • Switchable in two magnifications: 10 or 20 times

excerpt.rendered: A Binocular Stereomicroscope to Detect Small Scratches and Stains through Stereopsis
